title: My Teacher Of The Year
description: My Teacher of the YearMs. Diane Grove, a special education teacher for Knox County School.She has been, Rain's special education teacher since Rain was in the 1st grade in 2012.Rain is now going into the 5th grade, at Knox County School in August 2017.Today Rain, wants to say thanks for showing him kindness, patience every day.My special education teacher, Ms. Grove has gone above and beyond teaching and helping me to learn and grow each day.My Teacher of the Year is my award to a very hard working special education teacher, from school year 2012 thru 2017.
author: Rain Fields
